A good minister of Jesus Christ a funeral sermon for the Reverend Richard Steel, a faithful and useful minister of the Gospel, delivered Novemb. 27, 1692 / by George Hamond ... Hamond, George, 1620-1705. Steele, Richard, 1629-1692.

Printed for Samuel Sprint ..., and John Lawrence ..., London : 1693.
